description_html: The Mara Grande chandelier by Tech Lighting has a rare cohesion of warm, sophisticated styling and dramatic flair. Thoughtfully arranged clusters composed of 45 frosted glass globes softly diffuse the LED light for an unmistakably high-end modern chandelier. Available in an Aged Brass or a Satin Nickel finish, Mara Grande comes with 60” of variable rigid stems to accommodate high ceilings. With 45 LED modules, Mara Grande uses 117 watts and delivers a bright 3015 lumens at 2700K, 90 CRI. Its dimensions are 51” high and 32.6” in diameter.
